hanzi-su-wiki:
遷

Значения

Менять (место); перемещать; переезжать; дарить (перемещать от себя)

Мнемоника

Переезд 辶 большого 大 босса с мандатом 己 в западные 西 пустыни считался разжалованием.

Варианты

迁
purpleculture_pinyin:
qiān
to move; to shift; to change (a position or location etc); to promote
двигаться; переключать; изменить (должность или местонахождение и т. д.); продвигать
rtega_mnemonic:
遷遷RS
迁迁		move, shift, change, transfer
  • go ⻌ climbing 䙴: one moves and changes position all the time
  • ⓢ go ⻌ a thousand times 千: one moves and changes position all the time
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 迁)
Pictophonetic: 䙴 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
遷移 [ qiān yí ]: to migrate; to move
遷徙 [ qiān xǐ ]: to migrate; to move
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left

heisig_chinese_memo: Since the days of the Old West, traveling has resituated itself from trying not to step on big snakes to driving on big roads.
heisig_constituent: transition, old west, large, St. Bernard, snake, self, road
heisig_story: West . . . St. Bernard dog . . . snake . . . road.
koohiiStory1: Since the days of the Old West, traveling has transitioned from trying not to step on big snakes to driving on big roads.
koohiiStory2: The west has gone through quite a transition, gone are the days when dogs and snakes roamed the desert, it´s all roads and casinos now.
kunYomi: うつ.る、うつ.す、みやこがえ
jp_example_words: 変遷(へんせん): change, transition, vicissitudes
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Going from a scooter to a helicopter that's big even for yourself (oneself), is huge transition.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It's an upward transition, so that's nice, but it's still going to take you a long time to get used to using a big helicopter instead of a scooter.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You decide one transition isn't enough, so you transition to a centaur (せん) too. Now you're a big half horse-half human creature and you'll fit in the big helicopter better.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: A centaur is just a human halfway between transitioning into a horse, so it isn't even that hard to do!

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the self (己) that was big (大) in the west (覀) moves (⻌) to change
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: With a thousand roads leading to a thousand place, it's hard to choose where to resituate yourself.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription from " Yi ", " 𠨧 " sound. " 𠨧 " from " cock ", " skull " sound. Chen Changyuan believes that " fontaine " and " west " are similar in shape and resemble a bird's nest. From the fontanelle to the fontanelle, it is like people moving the nest together. It is the word " move " for migration.

Jin Wen means migration, He Zun: "Only the king moved to his house in Cheng Zhou."

According to Chen Bingxin, the simple form of Wangshan Chu was not from the " fontaner " but from the " horn ", but believed that it meant catching an animal horn and moving away. Gu Cun said. However, whether the right half of He Zun's word is from " Yi " is still unconfirmed. Ma Chengyuan believes that the right half is from " Lu " from " Yan ", and Zhang Yachu believes that the right half from " Lu " from " Yu ".

"Said Wen": "Move, go ascend. From the sound of 辵𠨧. Ming, the ancient prose moved from the west of the hand."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " yi ", " 𠨧 " sound. " 𠨧 " from " cock ", " skull " sound. Chen Changyuan believes that " fontaine " and " west " are similar in shape and resemble a bird's nest. From the fontanelle to the fontanelle, it is like people moving the nest together. It is the word " move " for migration.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「邑」，「𠨧」聲。「𠨧」從「舁」，「囟」聲。陳昌遠認為「囟」與「西」形近，象鳥巢，從舁從囟就象人們共同搬巢，是遷徙的「遷」字。

　　金文表示遷徙，何尊：「唯王初遷宅于成周」。

　　陳秉新則根據望山楚簡字形不從「囟」而從「角」，而認為象捉住獸角使遷離之意。姑存一說。不過，何尊此字右半是否從「邑」仍未有定論，馬承源認為右半從「呂」從「燕」，張亞初認為右半從「呂」從「魚」，待考。

　　《說文》：「遷，登也。从辵𠨧聲。拪，古文遷从手西。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「邑」，「𠨧」聲。「𠨧」從「舁」，「囟」聲。陳昌遠認為「囟」與「西」形近，象鳥巢，從舁從囟就象人們共同搬巢，是遷徙的「遷」字。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
遷 (Simplified: 迁)
Pinyin: qiān
English Definition: to move; to shift; to change (a position or location etc); to promote
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 辵
Pictophonetic: 䙴 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 䙴 [ qiān ] to fly, to move, to change
Example Words:
遷移 [ qiān yí ]: to migrate; to move
遷徙 [ qiān xǐ ]: to migrate; to move
More: 遷* | *遷 | *遷*

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 䙴 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 䙴 [ qiān ] to fly, to move, to change
①機關、住所等另換地點：遷居。遷移。遷徙。
②變動，轉變：變遷。遷就(改變自己的意見，湊合別人)。遷延(拖延)。遷怒。事過境遷。
③貶謫，放逐：遷謫(貶官遠地)。遷客(流遷或被貶謫到外地的官)。
④古代稱調動官職，一般指升職：升遷。

変遷(へんせん): change, transition, vicissitudes

金文從「 邑 」，「 𠨧 」聲。「 𠨧 」從「 舁 」，「 囟 」聲。陳昌遠認為「 囟 」與「 西 」形近，象鳥巢，從舁從囟就象人們共同搬巢，是遷徙的「 遷 」字。 金文表示遷徙，何尊：「唯王初遷宅于成周」。 陳秉新則根據望山楚簡字形不從「 囟 」而從「 角 」，而認為象捉住獸角使遷離之意。姑存一說。不過，何尊此字右半是否從「 邑 」仍未有定論，馬承源認為右半從「 呂 」從「 燕 」，張亞初認為右半從「 呂 」從「 魚 」，待考。 《說文》：「遷，登也。从辵𠨧聲。拪，古文遷从手西。」
Bronze inscription from " Yi", " 𠨧" sound. " 𠨧" from " cock", " skull" sound. Chen Changyuan believes that " fontaine" and " west" are similar in shape and resemble a bird's nest. From the fontanelle to the fontanelle, it is like people moving the nest together. It is the word " move" for migration. Jin Wen means migration, He Zun: "Only the king moved to his house in Cheng Zhou." According to Chen Bingxin, the simple form of Wangshan Chu was not from the " fontaner" but from the " horn", but believed that it meant catching an animal horn and moving away. Gu Cun said. However, whether the right half of He Zun's word is from " Yi" is still unconfirmed. Ma Chengyuan believes that the right half is from " Lu" from " Yan", and Zhang Yachu believes that the right half from " Lu" from " Yu". "Said Wen": "Move, go ascend. From the sound of 辵𠨧. Ming, the ancient prose moved from the west of the hand."

遷字的基本解释

遷
qiān
见“迁”。

遷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》七然切，平仙，清。］
亦作“拪1”。“迁1”的繁体字。
(1)登；上升。
(2)迁移；搬动。
(3)迁居，移换所在地。
(4)运销，贩卖。
(5)归向，跟从。
(6)变更，变化。
(7)去，离开。
(8)离散。
(9)转退。
(10)晋升或调动。
(11)流放，放逐。
(12)贬谪，降职。

遷字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遷； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1265第04
〔古文〕??拪??【唐韻】七然切【集韻】親然切，?音韆。【說文】登也。【廣韻】去下之高也。【詩·小雅】遷于喬木。　又遷徙也。【易·益卦】君子以見善則遷，有過則攺。【書·益稷】懋遷有無化居。【註】懋，勉其民，徙有於無，交易變化，其所居積之貨也。　又移物曰遷。【禮·曲禮】先生書策琴瑟在前，坐而遷之。【註】諸物當前，跪而遷移之。　又變易也。【左傳·昭五年】吾子爲國政，未攺禮，而又遷之。　又徙國曰遷。【周禮·秋官·小司?】二曰詢國遷。【註】謂徙都攺邑。　又徙官曰遷。【前漢·賈誼傳】誼超遷，歲中至大中大夫。　又貶秩曰左遷。【史記·韓王信傳】項王王諸將近地，而王獨遠居，是左遷也。又【張蒼傳】吾極知其左遷。【註】是時尊右?左，故謂貶秩爲左遷。　又【正韻】謫也，放逐也。【臯陶謨】何遷乎有苗。　又君遷，木名。【左思·吳都賦】平仲君遷。　又姓。　又西烟切，音仙。【前漢·王莽傳】立安爲新遷王。【註】服䖍曰：遷，音仙。師古曰：遷，猶仙耳。不勞假借。　又叶七情切，音淸。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiān］
["Guangyun" Qiran cut, Pingxian, Qing. ]
Also known as "拪1". Traditional characters for "move 1".
(1) Ascend; rise.
(2) Relocation; move.
(3) Relocate and change location.
(4) Transportation and sales.
(5) Go and follow.
(6) Change, change.
(7) Go, leave.
(8) Discrete.
(9) Transfer back.
(10) Promotion or transfer.
(11) Exile, exile.
(12) Relegation, demoted.
move

[Easy·Yi Gua] A gentleman will move when he sees good, but he will lose if he has passed. 【Book·Yiji】Whether Maoqian is alive or not. 【Note】Mao, exhort the people, move the existence from the non-existence, the transaction changes, and the goods they live in are also.　Move things again and say move. 【Li·Qu Li】Mr. Shu Ce Qinse is in front, sits and moves. [Note] Everything is present, kneeling and moving.　It has changed again. [Zuo Zhuan·5th Year of Zhao] My son was a state government, and he moved without salute.　Move to the country again. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Xiaosi?】Secondly, Xun Guo moved. [Note] It is said that the capital of relocation is in Yi.　I moved the official again and said I moved. [Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography] Yi Chao moved to a middle-aged doctor.　Relegated and said to move to the left. [Historical Records·Han Wang Xin Chuan] Wang Wang and Zhu generals approached the land, while Wang Duyuan lived and moved to the left. Also [Zhang Cang Biography] I know that it moved to the left. [Note] It is Shizun from the right to the left, so the relegation is called the left shift.　 [Zheng Yun] Exile and exile. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Li'an is the newly moved king. [Note] The service said: Qian, Yinxian. Shi Gu said: "Moving, like fairy ears." Name meaning

qiān
вм. 迁
Radicals: 覀, 大, 己  (helicopter, big, oneself, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
Going from a scooter to a helicopter that's big even for yourself (oneself), is huge transition.
It's an upward transition, so that's nice, but it's still going to take you a long time to get used to using a big helicopter instead of a scooter.
Reading Mnemonic
You decide one transition isn't enough, so you transition to a centaur (せん) too. Now you're a big half horse-half human creature and you'll fit in the big helicopter better.
A centaur is just a human halfway between transitioning into a horse, so it isn't even that hard to do!
